page.title: 07A FORTON FAMILY DAY
page.content: At about 7.30am we wake up for another day.My sister and I have to get ready for school in one hour because we have to set off at 8.30am.My mum and dad have to go to work at different times. My dad sets off between 8.00am and 8.50am because he travels around to different places to work.My dad is a service engineer for Rank Xrox and my mum is an engineer for Norweb. At 8.30am we set off for school.At school we did something for the Mildenhall treasure.Then at 10.30am play time we play Chain Tig or Stuck in the Mud.After play time we did some S.M.P.12.00am _ 13.00pm it is lunch time and we had Fish and Chips.After dinner we did some art.At 14.15pm _ 14.30pm it is play time.After play we carried on with our art till 15.00pm. At 15.00pm we had story.15.00pm it is home time.{(continued on page 8)}
